full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THAB LHA MCHOD TSUL BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(TSUL 'DI NI YUL MI THAMS CAD KYIS LO REL THAB LHA LA LAN RE MA CHAG PAR MCHOD 'DUG CING, ,DE YANG SOG YUL DU GNA' DUS NAS DAR BA'I THAB LHA MCHOD PA'I LAG LEN SOG YIG GIS BRI BA ZHIG YOD PA DES @005B MCHOD MKHAN MANG DU YOD PA LA, PHYIS DUS SU DPAL MGON MING CAN LA KHA GA-YAR BZHIG GIS SOG YIG DPE DE LA GZHIR BYAS, ,THAB LHA LA ME LTAR BSAM PAS MI LHA BSKYED TSUL SOGS BSNAN NAS PHAL CHER SOG PO'I LUGS SROL SNGA MA SOR BZHAG STE SBYAR BA'I YIG NYOG LA MING SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES 'DOGS PA NGO TSA BOR BA'I BRTUL ZHUGS SU SNANG BA DE KHAL KHA'I YUL PHYOGS SU DAR SO CHE BAR BYUNG BAS RKYEN BYAS TE, ,MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG PAS LUGS DE DGAG NAS ME MCHOD DPAL 'BYOR RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA GSAR RTZOM GNANG BA DE NANG JI LTA BA BZHIN MCHOD NA YUL PHYOGS SU BKRA SHIS PAR 'GYUR NGES MOD KYANG, ,DAD LDAN 'GA' ZHIG NAS CI KYANG THAB KHA'I LHA LA MCHOD TSUL ZHIG DGOS PA'I BSKUL MA NAN TAN 'BYUNG BAR BRTEN, ,@006A *, ,AI MING CAN GYIS 'GAL MED PHYOGS SU BSGRIGS PA 'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
